LDAPServerList.title: LDAPServerList
LDAPServerList.description: List of LDAP servers for NoMAD to use instead of doing SRV lookups. (2k12.jodapro.com, usaddc2.jodapro.com)

MenuGetHelp.title: MenuGetHelp
MenuGetHelp.description: Changes the menu text of the Get Help menu item. (Support)

ADDomain.title: ADDomain
ADDomain.description: Defines the AD domain you’re working with (jodapro.com)

ExportableKey.title: ExportableKey
ExportableKey.description: Determines if the private key from any generate certs can be exported. (False)

MenuFileServers.title: MenuFileServers
MenuFileServers.description: Changes the menu text of the File Servers menu. (“Files”)

HideExpirationMessage.title: HideExpirationMessage
HideExpirationMessage.description: Specifies text to show in the menu bar when the password countdown has been suppressed. (You’re the best!)

HomeAppendDomain.title: HomeAppendDomain
HomeAppendDomain.description: Adds your AD domain to the end of the user’s hold folder. Used for when the home in AD is not fully qualified. (True)

HideGetSoftware.title: HideGetSoftware
HideGetSoftware.description: Determines if the Get Software menu is visible. (True)

DontShowWelcomeDefaultOn.title: DontShowWelcomeDefaultOn
DontShowWelcomeDefaultOn.description: Shows the Welcome Screen, but checks the “Don’t show again” box by default. Useful for when you want to show the Welcome screen only once. (True)

LDAPOnly.title: LDAPOnly
LDAPOnly.description: Sets NoMAD to treat the remote server as just an LDAP server and not specifically AD. (True)

RecursiveGroupLookup.title: RecursiveGroupLookup
RecursiveGroupLookup.description: Allows for recursive group lookups in AD to find all nested groups a user may be a member of. (True)

MessageNotConnected.title: MessageNotConnected
MessageNotConnected.description: The text in the menu bar to display when NoMAD is not connected to the AD domain. (No dice!)

HicFix.title: HicFix
HicFix.description: Enables a secondary password change with AD to fix an issue with macOS 10.13.0 with AD-bound mobile accounts. (True)

HideQuit.title: HideQuit
HideQuit.description: Determines if the Quit menu is visible. (True)

LoginItem.title: LoginItem
LoginItem.description: Determines whether or not to add NoMAD to the user’s start up items. (False)

HideRenew.title: HideRenew
HideRenew.description: Determines if the Renew Tickets menu is visible. (True)

DontShowWelcome.title: DontShowWelcome
DontShowWelcome.description: Determines if the Welcome window is shown on first launch. (True)

UseKeychainPrompt.title: UseKeychainPrompt
UseKeychainPrompt.description: Will cause NoMAD to force a sign in to NoMAD to caputre the password in the Keychain. (True)

WifiNetworks.title: WifiNetworks
WifiNetworks.description: SSIDs of wireless networks you would like to associate any certificates created with NoMAD to via an identity preference in the Keychain. (CorpNet)

IconOff.title: IconOff
IconOff.description: Specifies an icon file to use for when NoMAD is not connected in dark mode.Note: this needs to be a 16×16 image to display correctly. (/usr/local/icons/NoMADOffDark.png)

ConfigureChrome.title: ConfigureChrome
ConfigureChrome.description: Tells NoMAD to update your Chrome settings to allow for Kerberos auth with your AD domain. (True)

PersistExpiration.title: PersistExpiration
PersistExpiration.description: Setting this to true will display the password expiration countdown even when the user is not logged into the domain. (False)

Template.title: Template
Template.description: The certificate template that you’d like to request when using the Windows CA. (User Auth)

UPCAlert.title: UPCAlert
UPCAlert.description: Determines if NoMAD will alert the user to Unannounced Password Changes, typically when the password was changed in AD and not from the user’s system. (True)

ChangePasswordType.title: ChangePasswordType
ChangePasswordType.description: Determines type of ChangePassword function (Kerberos, Task, URL, App, and None are currently supported)

HideHelp.title: HideHelp
HideHelp.description: Determines if the Get Help menu is visible. (True)

StateChangeAction.title: StateChangeAction
StateChangeAction.description: Path to a script that will be launched on network changes. (“/Library/Application Support/scripts/notify-and-update.sh”)

KeychainItems.title: KeychainItemsDebug
KeychainItems.description: Enbables KeychainItems debugging. Will attempt to update passwords on any sign in through the NoMAD UI and log verbosely as to what’s not working. (True)

ChangePasswordOptions.title: ChangePasswordOptions
ChangePasswordOptions.description: Task, URL or App path for ChangePasswordType (<<serial>>, <<fullname>>, <<shortname>> and <<domain>> are currently supported as substitutions). (“/Applications/Google Chrome.app”)

GetCertificateAutomatically.title: GetCertificateAutomatically
GetCertificateAutomatically.description: Determines if a certificate is automatically requested for a user when they don’t have a valid existing certificate. (True)

LocalPasswordSyncOnMatchOnly.title: LocalPasswordSyncOnMatchOnly
LocalPasswordSyncOnMatchOnly.description: Determines if the domain password will be synced to the local account only when the account names match. (True)

SignInWindowAlert.title: SignInWindowAlert
SignInWindowAlert.description: Makes the NoMAD Sign In window the foremost window when a user is not signed in. (True)

UPCAlertAction.title: UPCAlertAction
UPCAlertAction.description: Path to a script or other binary to execute when a UPC Alert occurs. (/usr/local/bin/upca.sh)

SignInWindowOnLaunch.title: SignInWindowOnLaunch
SignInWindowOnLaunch.description: This will force the Sign In window to display when NoMAD launches. (False)

CaribouTime.title: CaribouTime
CaribouTime.description: Changes the icon set to Carrie the Caribou (true)

HidePrefs.title: HidePrefs
HidePrefs.description: Prevents the Preferences menu from being accessible (True)

HideLockScreen.title: HideLockScreen
HideLockScreen.description: Determines if the Lock Screen menu is visible. (True)

MenuRenewTickets.title: MenuRenewTickets
MenuRenewTickets.description: Changes the menu text of the Renew Tickets menu item. (Renew)

AutoConfigure.title: AutoConfigure
AutoConfigure.description: Keyword to determine what auto configuration scheme to use (TSL)

ShowHome.title: ShowHome
ShowHome.description: Determines whether the AD home share is shown in the menu. (False)

HideAbout.title: HideAbout
HideAbout.description: Removes the About menu from NoMAD. (True)

LocalPasswordSync.title: LocalPasswordSync
LocalPasswordSync.description: Determines if we keep the local password in sync with the network password or not. (True)

SignInWindowOnLaunchExclusions.title: SignInWindowOnLaunchExclusions
SignInWindowOnLaunchExclusions.description: An array of strings for local users that will not be shown the Sign In window automatically. [ituser, ituser2, otheruser]

LDAPAnonymous.title: LDAPAnonymous
LDAPAnonymous.description: Determines if NoMAD uses anonymous LDAP binding when getting the user record. (True)

LDAPOverSSL.title: LDAPOverSSL
LDAPOverSSL.description: Determines if NoMAD uses LDAP over SSL. (True)

RenewTickets.title: RenewTickets
RenewTickets.description: Setting to determine if auto ticket renewal is used (False)

SelfServicePath.title: SelfServicePath
SelfServicePath.description: Sets a path for an application to be used with the Get Software menu item. (“/Applications/IT Software.app”)

PasswordExpireCustomAlert.title: PasswordExpireCustomAlert
PasswordExpireCustomAlert.description: Custom alert to show in the menu bar instead of days to go. (Account expiring soon)

GetHelpType.title: GetHelpType
GetHelpType.description: Determines type of GetHelp function (Bomgar, URL and App are currently supported) (URL)

X509CA.title: X509CA
X509CA.description: FQDN of the Windows web Certificate Authority you would like to use. (x509.jodapro.com)

MenuGetSoftware.title: MenuGetSoftware
MenuGetSoftware.description: Changes the menu text of the Software menu item. (Software)

MenuUserName.title: MenuUserName
MenuUserName.description: Changes the menu text of the user name menu item before a user logs in.

MountSharesWithFinder.title: MountSharesWithFinder
MountSharesWithFinder.description: When file shares are set to automount, this mounts them via the Finder instead of via the API. (False)

DontMatchKerbPrefs.title: DontMatchKerbPrefs
DontMatchKerbPrefs.description: Determines if the kasspwd server is written out to the com.apple.Kerberos preference domain. (True)

MenuAbout.title: MenuAbout
MenuAbout.description: Determines the name of the About menu item. (“This Application”)

SecondsToRenew.title: SecondsToRenew
SecondsToRenew.description: Setting for how often to renew tickets. (3600)

HideExpiration.title: HideExpiration
HideExpiration.description: Hides the password countdown display in the menu bar. (True)

GetHelpOptions.title: GetHelpOptions
GetHelpOptions.description: URL or Path for GetHelpType (<<serial>>, <<fullname>>, <<shortname>> and <<domain>> are currently supported as substitutions) (“/Applications/Google Chrome.app”)

CustomLDAPAttributes.title: CustomLDAPAttributes
CustomLDAPAttributes.description: List of custom attributes to query in AD on each user record lookup. Attributes will be written back to the UserAttributes key. ([ “pwdLastSet”, “yourAttributeHere”])

HideSignOut.title: HideSignOut
HideSignOut.description: Determines if the Sign Out menu is visible. (True)

ChangePasswordCommand.title: ChangePasswordCommand
ChangePasswordCommand.description: Script or other binary to run when a password is sucessfully changed. (“/usr/bin/local/scripts/something.bash”)

MenuGetCertificate.title: MenuGetCertificate
MenuGetCertificate.description: Changes the menu text of the Get Certificate menu item. (Update Account)

AutoRenewCert.title: AutoRenewCert
AutoRenewCert.description: Sets the number of days to go on a cert before automatically renewing it (30)

MenuHomeDirectory.title: MenuHomeDirectory
MenuHomeDirectory.description: Changes the menu text of the Home Directory menu item. (Network Home)

PasswordExpireCustomWarnTime.title: PasswordExpireCustomWarnTime
PasswordExpireCustomWarnTime.description: Will cause the custom alert to be only shown at a specific threshold, and in yellow. (20)

LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncLocalUsers.title: LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncLocalUsers
LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncLocalUsers.description: An array of user names that if they match the current local user, NoMAD won’t synchronize the password regardless of what user logs into AD. ([“bob”, “sam”, “pat”])

UseKeychain.title: UseKeychain
UseKeychain.description: Determines whether to store the Kerberos password in the user’s keychain. (True)

UserSwitch.title: UserSwitch
UserSwitch.description: Ensures that the local user name is the active ticket being used by NoMAD. (False)

MessagePasswordChangePolicy.title: MessagePasswordChangePolicy
MessagePasswordChangePolicy.description: Message text to display in the password change dialog to help the user understand how complext they need to be. (Your password is required to have 128 characters.)

MenuPasswordExpires.title: MenuPasswordExpires
MenuPasswordExpires.description: Changes the menu text of the password expiration menu item before a user logs in. (Welcome!)

PasswordExpireCustomAlertTime.title: PasswordExpireCustomAlertTime
PasswordExpireCustomAlertTime.description: Will cause the custom alert to be only shown at a specific threshold, and in red. (5)

ConfigureChromeDomain.title: ConfigureChromeDomain
ConfigureChromeDomain.description: Tells NoMAD to update your Chrome settings to allow for Kerberos auth with for the set domain. This allows for Chrome to work with domains other than your AD Domain. Note that the domain will be automatically wildcarded, so setting a domain of “nomad.test” will result in *nomad.test being set. Multiple domains are supported, seperate them by “,” (nomad.test)

LightsOutIKnowWhatImDoing.title: LightsOutIKnowWhatImDoing
LightsOutIKnowWhatImDoing.description: Removes the icon from the menu bar. Note that NoMAD still is in the menu bar, just with no icon and taking up less space. (True)

IconOn.title: IconOn
IconOn.description: Specifies an icon file to use for when NoMAD is connected. Note: this needs to be a 16×16 image to display correctly. (/usr/local/icons/NoMADOn.png)

CleanCerts.title: CleanCerts
CleanCerts.description: Determines if NoMAD should remove extra certs from user’s Keychain. This will leave the 2 newest and the 2 oldest certs in the keychian. (True)

MessageUPCAlert.title: MessageUPCAlert
MessageUPCAlert.description: Message to be shown in an UPCAlert notification. (Your password was changed elsewhere.)

IconOnDark.title: IconOnDark
IconOnDark.description: Specifies an icon file to use for when NoMAD is connected in dark mode. Note: this needs to be a 16×16 image to display correctly. (/usr/local/icons/NoMADOnDark.png)

LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncNetworkUsers.title: LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncNetworkUsers
LocalPasswordSyncDontSyncNetworkUsers.description: An array of user names that if they match the AD user signing in, NoMAD won’t synchronize the password regardless of what user logs into AD. [“bob”, “sam”, “pat”]

LDAPType.title: LDAPType
LDAPType.description: An indication of what specific LDAP type is in use. Currently only “OD” for Apple’s Open Directory is available. (OD)

MessageLocalSync.title: MessageLocalSync
MessageLocalSync.description: Message text for when a user is asked for their local password to sync their network password to their local account. (Please provide your local password.)

SignInWindowAlertTime.title: SignInWindowAlertTime
SignInWindowAlertTime.description: Seconds between the SignInWindowAlert making the Sign In window the foremost window. (360)

TitleSignIn.title: TitleSignIn
TitleSignIn.description: Changes the title of the sign in window. (Password please)

MenuWelcome.title: MenuWelcome
MenuWelcome.description: Path to a folder enclosing an index.html file and associated resources for displaying as a Welcome screen when running NoMAD. (/usr/local/welcome/)

PasswordExpireAlertTime.title: PasswordExpireAlertTime
PasswordExpireAlertTime.description: The threshold, in seconds, for when to start notifying the user about their expiring password – set to 0 to never be bothered, and defaults to 15 days or 1,296,000 seconds. (3600)

SignOutCommand.title: SignOutCommand
SignOutCommand.description: Path to a script or other binary to execute on sign out. (/usr/local/bin/signout.sh)

MenuChangePassword.title: MenuChangePassword
MenuChangePassword.description: Changes the menu text of the Change Password menu item. (Update Account)

SignInCommand.title: SignInCommand
SignInCommand.description: Script or command to be run when NoMAD completes a successful sign in to AD. (“/usr/bin/touch /tmp/login”)
